parameter-group.name: Cloud Connection
parameter-group.label: Smartthings Connection
parameter-group.description: This enables the Input Source and Channel Number channels on TV's that don't support this locally, by connecting wth the Smartthings cloud API. Only available with WebSocket and SecureWebSocket Protocols.

parameter.name: hostName
parameter.label: Host Name
parameter.description: Network address of the Samsung TV.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: TCP Port
parameter.description: TCP port of the Samsung TV (legacy: 1515, 7001, 15500, 55000 websockets: 8001, 8002).

parameter.name: macAddress
parameter.label: MAC Address
parameter.description: MAC Address of the Samsung TV.

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: States how often a refresh shall occur in milliseconds.

parameter.name: protocol
parameter.label: Remote Control Protocol
parameter.description: The type of remote control protocol. This depends on the age of the TV.

parameter.name: webSocketToken
parameter.label: Websocket Token
parameter.description: Security token for secure websocket connection

parameter.name: subscription
parameter.label: Subscribe to UPNP
parameter.description: Reduces polling on UPNP devices, but may be unreliable, disable if you have problems

parameter.name: smartThingsApiKey
parameter.label: Smartthings PAT
parameter.description: Go to https://account.smartthings.com/tokens and obtain a Personal Access Token, enter it here.

parameter.name: smartThingsDeviceId
parameter.label: Smartthings Device ID
parameter.description: Once your PAT is entered and saved, look in the log for the Device ID for this TV, enter it here.
